Description: There have been recent clear clinical activity signals for chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cell therapies in refractory pediatric solid cancers. This session will review these published achievements and focus on unpublished advancements in discovering optimal immunoncology therapeutic targets for pediatric cancers and how these are being developed in preclinical models and in ongoing clinical trials.
Location: Ballroom 6 B - Upper Level - Convention Center
SearchResultBody: SY26. Advancing Cellular Therapies for Childhood Solid Malignancies: Dedicated to the Memory of Sharon B. Murphy
